类的使用
mybank.Account

    • mybank中Account的使用

      返回Account的mybank中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      Account MyBank.setAcc​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list)
      Method setAcc() This method set content of account into an arraylist in the memory with the help of content read.
      参数类型为Account的mybank中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void MyBank.Change​(Account acc)
      Method Change() This method is used for user to change his pin.
      void MyBank.Close​(Account acc)
      Method Close() This method is used for a user to close his account and delete his user file.
      void MyBank.Deposit​(Account acc)
      Method Deposit() This method is used to deposit money to the account given by a user
      void MyBank.Login2​(Account acc)
      Method Login2() This method is used to enter the interface of choosing operations after login
      void MyBank.Lookup​(Account acc)
      Method Lookup() This method is used for a user to check balance, unclear money, state of account in the user file.
      void MyBank.Recover​(Account acc)
      Method Recover() This method is used to recover state of account from suspend state to active state.
      void MyBank.Suspend​(Account acc)
      Method Suspend() This method is used for a user who wants to suspend the account.
      void MyBank.Withdraw​(Account acc)
      Method Withdraw() This method is used for a user to withdraw money from his account.
      void MyBank.writeFile​(Account acct)
      Method wirteFile This method generate file from the arraylist of account memorized in the memory.
